::Epyon/Hot Rod::

He came out of the training room, and met up with Khonklor.
"Yes, lets go." He walked on.

Hot Rod came out of the CR chamber to find Epyon and Khonklor.

"It's time," says Epyon.
"Good, lets do it," replyes Hot Rod. 

When they get outside they both transform and head for the IGL.
